channel.title: Final request for some time
channel.description:
Hello, a few weeks ago i had my dds spec working. Now it's just gone bust.
Does anyone have a working dds special on NPC!..
Not player.. [b][size=50pt]NPC[/size][/b]
Many thanks.

item.title: Final request for some time
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

Hippie, i’ve done that… It doesn’t work srsly…

What i have in attack method…

					else if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 5698 && specialAmount >= 25 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] 					== 5698 && DoubleHit == true) {
					int j = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absX;
					int k = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absY;
					int l = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].playerLevel[playerHitpoints];
					//staticAnimation(252, absX, absY, 100);
					Zamaht(252, 100, 5, 2);
					calculateSpecial();
					hitDiff = misc.random(playerMaxHit);
					usingSpecial = false;
					specialDamage = 0;
					specialDamage2 = 0;
					specialAmount -= 25;
					}

What i got in Npc method…

					else if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 5698 && specialAmount >= 25 && DoubleHit == true) {
					int j = server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].absX;
					int k = server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].absY;
					//staticAnimation(252, absX, absY, 100);
					Zamaht(252,100,5,2);
					calcspec2();
					hitDiff = specialDamage;
					usingSpecial = false;
					DoubleHit = false;
					specialAmount -= 25;
					}

Care to fix that?

Read full topic

item.title: Final request for some time
item.dc:creator: @Jordiescape Jordiescape
item.description:
@Jordiescape wrote:

This is mine,it might not be the same for your server,just in case :

public void DDSSpecial() { if(IsAttackingNPC && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 5698 && SpecialDelay >= 2) { staticAnimation(252, absX, absY, 100); setAnimation(0x426); actionTimer = 1; SpecDamgNPC(25); DDS2Damg = true; DDStimer = 1; AnimationReset = true; teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; SpecDamgNPC(25); SpecialDelay -= 1; } else if(IsAttacking && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 5698 && SpecialDelay >= 2 && (PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].inwildy || PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].inwildy2) || (duelStatus == 3)) { int j = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absX; int k = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absY; int l = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].playerLevel[playerHitpoints]; SpecDamg(25); DDS2Damg = true; DDStimer = 1; staticAnimation(252, absX, absY, 100); startAnimation(0x426); actionTimer = 4; teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; SpecialDelay -= 2; } else if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 5698 && SpecialDelay >= 2 && !DDS) DDS = true; else if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 5698 && SpecialDelay >= 2 && DDS) DDS = false; else { sendMessage("You dont have enough power."); } getFilling(); }

Read full topic
